title.en: Boku no Shiru Anata no Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of the You I Know

altTitles.th: เรื่องของคุณที่ผมรู้

altTitles.vi: Tôi biết câu chuyện của bạn

description.en:
1-3: Boku no Shiru Anata no Hanashi (Your Story I Have Known)  
High school student Matsumoto Haato has fallen in love with his abusive mother's ex-boyfriend, Shibusawa, a yakuza who was nice to him in the past. With nowhere left to go, he turns to the gruff but kind older man. A three chapter love story that details the changing relationship between the two men over the years.  
  
4: Sauté d'Oignons  
When two people are together, the sweetness and the spiciness of love are the greatest flavors. High school students Negi and Tama have been together since elementary school, and now Negi is ready to move their relationship to the next level, but Tama is still unsure…  
  
5: Koe ga Todoku no Nara (If The Voice Reaches)  
Shouta is constantly getting into fights, but in spite of that, he's a nice guy. One day, while saving someone from bullies, a weirdo samurai shows up claiming to be haunting him. Now Shouta must deal with this constant spiritual companion… and all the emotions that come with him!  
  
6: Kami-sama no Me wo Nusunde  
Narasaki still vividly remembers the day in high school when his friend confessed to him, and his heartless response. Years later, when he is confessed to by another guy, he's determined to give Wakatsuki the chance he didn't give that friend. But is he seeing the man in front of him, or just reliving the past?
